reviewText: After visiting Yellowstone and viewing this DVD in a restaurant in Jackson Hole, Whoming, we were faciinated by it during eating our meal.  I ordered it and have continued to enjoy it after returning home.  It is extremely lifelike and brings back wonderful memories of our trip.  Love it.

The photography in the DVD is beautiful.  However, it really is just a slide show of photographs to some lovely music.  There are definately some great photos, but if you are looking for some narration and info about the area this dvd doesn't have it.
Video was very good in helping us recreate our vacation at Yellowstone/Grand Teton parks since our own video was lost by the developer
